 Implicit substitution of ` y ` for ` x ` into a theorem.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Apr-1994.)
statement:
chvarv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
chvarv.2 $e |- ph $.
chvarv $p |- ps $.
$d ps x $.
